subject: [Ip-health] Draft report of 3rd WIPO PCDA is out
body:
The draft report of the 3rd WIPO PCDA can be found on the following
link.

http://www.wipo.int/meetings/en/doc_details.jsp?doc_id=76152


Document Code  	PCDA/3/3 PROV.
